revision.comment: Notification of altered sources needing review #IABot (v1.2.6)
revision.text: {{Talk header}} {{ArticleHistory | action1 = GAN | action1date = 22:27, 24 November 2009 | action1link = Talk:Battle of Ostrach/GA1 | action1result = listed | action1oldid = 327748338 |action2=WAR |action2date=02:18, 28 December 2009 |action2link=Wikipedia:WikiProject Military history/Assessment/Battle of Ostrach |action2result=approved |action2oldid=334019490 | currentstatus = GA | topic =War | dykdate = 17 October 2009 | dyklink = Wikipedia:Recent additions 249 }} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Germany|class=GA|importance=low|b1=yes|b2=yes|b3=yes|b4=yes|b5=yes}} {{WPMILHIST|class=A|Napoleonic=yes|French=yes|German=yes|A-Class=pass}} {{WikiProject France|class=GA}} {{WikiProject Austria|class=GA|HRE-taskforce=yes}} }} {{Talk:Battle_of_Ostrach/GA1}} == Books and journals == Just a question. This book: "Graham, Thomas, Baron Lynedoch.(?) The History of the campaign of 1796 in Germany and Italy. London, 1797." has clearly been published in 1797. How is it possible that it is used as a source for a battle that was fought in 1799? --[[User:Pulciazzo|Pulciazzo]] ([[User talk:Pulciazzo|talk]]) 19:38, 19 February 2015 (UTC) ::It is possible that the correct book can be this? "Lynedoch, Thomas Graham, Baron. The History of the Campaign of 1799 in Germany & Switzerland (Vol. 3) London : J. Barfield; 1803." --[[User:Pulciazzo|Pulciazzo]] ([[User talk:Pulciazzo|talk]]) 19:52, 19 February 2015 (UTC) :::The copy I used was a double copy, that is, it had both books in it, but the title was for the earlier book. Go figure. [[User:Auntieruth55|auntieruth]] [[User talk:Auntieruth55|(talk)]] 21:41, 19 February 2015 (UTC) ::::I'm traslating the article [[Battle of Stockach (1799)]] for wiki.it. I'm using some information in this article to study in deep the previous Battle of Ostrach. I just want to be sure to mention the right book and the right pages. --[[User:Pulciazzo|Pulciazzo]] ([[User talk:Pulciazzo|talk]]) 22:25, 19 February 2015 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just modified {{plural:2|one external link|2 external links}} on [[Battle of Ostrach]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=746663678 my edit]. If you have any questions, or need the bot to ignore the links, or the page altogether, please visit [[User:Cyberpower678/FaQs#InternetArchiveBot|this simple FaQ]] for additional information. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20070822224853/http://www.ostrach.de:80/geschichte/buchbuehldenkmal.htm to http://www.ostrach.de/geschichte/buchbuehldenkmal.htm *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20070822224853/http://www.ostrach.de:80/geschichte/buchbuehldenkmal.htm to http://www.ostrach.de/geschichte/buchbuehldenkmal.htm When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.â€”[[User:InternetArchiveBot|'''InternetArchiveBot''']] ([[User talk:InternetArchiveBot|Report bug]]) 19:42, 28 October 2016 (UTC)
